title: Barny Cakes - Wikipedia
text: Barny Cakes Appearance Barny is a brand of cakes, mainly distributed in the United Kingdom.[5] Mondelēz claimed it was its biggest biscuit category launch since Belvita in 2010.[6] The product is distributed in over 40 countries.[1] It is also marketed in Czech Republic as "Brumík", in Poland as "Lubisie", in Romania as "Barni", in France as "Ourson" and in Hungary as "Dörmi".
